website_summaries.verdict: This product is designed to clean your boat without hurting the wildlife or removing your wax.
pros: Safe to wash into the water
Does not strip away your polish or wax finish
Does a decent job of tackling the scum line
Works very well with a power sprayer
cons: May require more than one pass to get the spots out

customer_reviews.title: Works on cars
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an eco-friendly way to wash my car, so I bought this boat wash. This product smells like bubble gum and does a wonderful job cleaning my vehicle. I did not even put that much effort into cleaning, and it still came out very nice. Most importantly, the soap washed off all the salt. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: great for home car washes.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! This works wonderfully with our pressure washer and foam cannon to wash our cars. My husband wasn't thrilled at first because it doesn't foam a ton, but it cleans beautifully! I live that it isn't environmentally toxic. We really need to take good care of our planet and it is often easiest to start with cleaning products. Additionally, it is a great money saver to wash your cars at home! Enjoy some cost and earth savings...give this a go!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M

customer_reviews.title: Little soap goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Soap works very well. It breaks down dirt and grime making scrubbing easier. It’s concentrated so this bottle will last a long time. I love the fact that it’s environmentally friendly too.
customer_reviews.author: JCEDGE

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you are seraching for. Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Smells great. Washes great. Rinses off like magic. And won't hurt the lake, which our water runs almost directly into. It's exactly what I wanted to wash my old car.
customer_reviews.author: PeterK

customer_reviews.title: Smells Like Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the blueberry scent in this boat wash makes it clean better or if I'm just doing a better job because it smells so amazing. Either way, I LOVE using this stuff! A little goes a long way and it doesn't over suds so it is easy to rinse (and no embarrassing long trail of soap bubbles in the marina afterwards.) It is eco-friendly and biodegradable too. It smells so nice I might start bathing with it! :)
customer_reviews.author: JCub

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Washed our new jet skis and did a great job plus smelled great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Not a bottom hull cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I hoped this was the replacement for the EZ bottom cleaner. It is not, it does not remove stains that the bottom cleaner does. It does clean the surface scum easily, but does not touch the stains from the hard water.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: After I washed my boat I was very happy. I still had almost a full bottle. I washed my nasty old coolers from last year and thought about replacing. Since I had so much boat soap I washed the coolers and they are like new. Buy this stuff it works.
customer_reviews.author: John McAvoy

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my boat and I didn't worry about the environment while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Love my kitchen

customer_reviews.title: amazing grace!
customer_reviews.text: this is an outstanding product for auto boats anything outdoors if you want to wash it. if you care about the environment the lakes and streams in the water quality this is a must and it washes so well amazing stuff
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Boat Wash Soap
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to wash my clear coat painted aluminum 17' boat. It does a good job with an extendable handle soft bristle boat wash brush. It leaves a few spots when dry but not too bad. It is concentrated so lasts a long time. Is biodegradable so won't harm environment.
customer_reviews.author: Richard's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Does the job it is suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Boat soap does the job to remove salt and any other dirt from fishing, great product and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD VERDERAMO

customer_reviews.title: It makes lots of soap suds but doesn't clean many ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes lots of soap suds but doesn't clean many of the regular outdoor stains with just one cleaning. I don't mind the extra washing time if its truly biodegradable. It has been safe on my new boat finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, and smells great. Takes off my scum line with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Spoony920

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job on my boat and environmentally friendly to boot!
customer_reviews.author: JGH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I washed my Super Duty Ford (2002), my 22 ft MacGregor (1983) and my Mustang (2000); all with exceptional results. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: MjC

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great
customer_reviews.text: It does suds up a little but when it is washed off and into the lake, you do not notice it. Now I can leave my watercraft on the lift keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: miked998

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, Maynard!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had my doubts.........bought this to use with a new power sprayer. WOW! What a great job (both did!!) I have a koi pond & was concerned with contamination........was not an issue. You buy, you like!
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to clean however when mixed according to the instructions it isn't very soapy and you have to keep dipping your brush over and over. But that is the price you pay for being kind to the environment. I will continue to use it because of that.
customer_reviews.author: GPS Man

customer_reviews.title: This is some good stuff. It does a good job eco cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: This is some good stuff. It does a good job eco cleaning my boat and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie G

customer_reviews.title: Stick to what works
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try and be more earth friendly, so I purchased this instead of the "Star brite (original) hull cleaner". Well several hours and a lot of grief later I ended up buying more of what I always use, and the job is now done.
customer_reviews.author: deerjeff

customer_reviews.title: smells nice
customer_reviews.text: great product. smells good and makes my wave runner looking clean
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Boat looks good and the soap smells great and not like a cleaner or detergent. I have a 25 foot sea ray and the bottle lasted for a long time...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: It is not thick like Mothers or the other wash I got from the Boat dealer. It may wash my boat but it doesn't go as far as the other 2 I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Thomas

product_meta.title: Star Brite 089732PW Star Brite Sea Safe Boat Wash
product_meta.description: Star brite is the marine industry's leading manufacturer of waxes, polishes, cleaners, teak finishes, motor oils, fuel additives and more. Because Star brite is run by avid boaters who test every item on their own boats, only the latest technology and highest-quality ingredients are used.
feature_bullets: Removes dirt, stains, grease, road grime, oil and salt deposits
Cleans the entire boat; safe for use on fiberglass, vinyl, metal, glass, plastic, rubber and painted surfaces
Will not remove wax or polish

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
